---
title: Callouts
format: 
  docusaurus-md:
    quality: 1
  html: 
    quality: 1
  dashboard:
    quality: 0
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      ensureHtmlElements:
        - 
          - "div.callout.callout-note"
          - "div.callout.callout-note div.callout-header div.callout-title-container"
          - "div.callout.callout-note div.callout-body p"
    docusaurus-md:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        - [":::note\\[A small note\\]"]
---
